attributes.action: Allow The Use Of Firearms In Licensed Premises
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As a hasty response to an appalling act in 1987, the use of firearms was banned. This included licensed gun clubs.

We propose that licensed gun clubs be allowed to re-stock all weapons for use within the club. There is NO reason for home ownership but shooting is a hobby that has been banned un-necessarily.

The use of the weapons at the club could even be restricted to suitable acceptance by police consent.

From a sporting perspective, UK residents aren't allowed to practice locally for worldwide events.

It is now 20 years since the Firearms act was changed and we are still unable to pursue a sport based on an irrational response.

The Hungerford Massacre was an appalling event but shooting as a sport, in controlled clubs should not remain to be outlawed. THERE SHOULD STILL BE NO PRIVATE OWNERSHIP.
